name: LinkedIn Learning
description: It is an EduTech Platform. A user can learn or earn, learn skills after buying a subscription, and create courses after uploading videos.

name: Uboric Clone
description: Uboric is an e-commerce platform where users can find different kinds of utility products from various categories. Users can add as many as products cart and place the order.

name: Github Octo Profile
description: A nicer look at your GitHub profile and repository stats with data visualizations of your top languages and stars. Sort through your top repos by number of stars, forks, and size.

name: Memory Game
description: It is a game to test your memorization power with fun. It has different levels of difficulty. Player can save his/her best score.
